title: P2P Agent Update (request)
description: Update the information of the P2P agent for the current account. Can only be used by an approved P2P agent.

is_active.description: [Optional] The activation status of the agent.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
